name: P521.Signing.PrivateKey
desc: A P-521 private key used to create cryptographic signatures.

items.name: init<Bytes>(rawRepresentation: Bytes)
items.desc: Creates a P-521 private key for signing from a raw representation of the key.

items.name: init(compactRepresentable: Bool)
items.desc: Creates a random P-521 private key for signing.

items.name: init<Bytes>(derRepresentation: Bytes)
items.desc: Creates a P-521 private key for signing from a Distinguished Encoding Rules (DER) encoded representation of the key.

items.name: init(pemRepresentation: String)
items.desc: Creates a P-521 private key for signing from a Privacy-Enhanced Mail (PEM) representation of the key.

items.name: init<Bytes>(x963Representation: Bytes)
items.desc: Creates a P-521 private key for signing from an ANSI x9.63 representation of the key.

items.name: var rawRepresentation: Data
items.desc: A representation of the private key as a collection of bytes.

items.name: var derRepresentation: Data
items.desc: A Distinguished Encoding Rules (DER) encoded representation of the private key.

items.name: var pemRepresentation: String
items.desc: A Privacy-Enhanced Mail (PEM) representation of the private key.

items.name: var x963Representation: Data
items.desc: An ANSI x9.63 representation of the private key.

items.name: func signature<D>(for: D) -> P521.Signing.ECDSASignature
items.desc: Generates an Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) signature of the data you provide over the P-521 elliptic curve, using SHA-512 as a hash function.

items.name: func signature<D>(for: D) -> P521.Signing.ECDSASignature
items.desc: Generates an Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) signature of the digest you provide over the P-521 elliptic curve.

items.name: struct P521.Signing.ECDSASignature
items.desc: A P-521 elliptic curve digital signature algorithm (ECDSA) signature.
